task.summary: Removed owned/unowned pointers (all pointers are unowned now) support for shared pointers, more script bindings. remove "Resource" in favor of "shared_ptr"
accessing, adding and removing scripts from scripts
Lua iterators, more bindings (yay) and minor changes'n'shit
